name: Kyn World
description:
Kyn World is a planet divided in half by a massive mountain that reaches space. On this mountain life fights to stay alive on zero gravity. Ethereal plants called White Crypts fill the mountain as long as the light from the white moon shrines over them. 

Cyan is a white moon, forever shinning over the mountain. Blacya is the fiery moon that sets ablaze everything on the western hemisphere. Glacya is the icy moon that covers all eastern hemisphere on permafrost.

This game is currently in development, you can only play the Storm game mode on this build. 

You can follow the devlogs posted on my YouTube channel to stay up to date.
